summary: A suite of automated web tests that verify the end‑to‑end behavior of the domain registration application, covering form rendering, conditional sections, dynamic text, contact management, editing workflows, validation of required fields, handling of special organization types, and successful submission.
business_intent: To ensure the domain application workflow functions reliably for users, maintaining data integrity and compliance across various scenarios such as federal, tribal, and interstate registrations, and to catch regressions before release.
